General.Name: Sentoria Group Bhd
General.Description: Sentoria Group Berhad, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the property development, construction, and leisure and hospitality businesses in Malaysia. The company's Property Development segment develops residential, commercial, and leisure properties; and undertakes related activities. Its Leisure and Hospitality segment operates hotel, water, nature, and safari parks. The company also acts as a general contractor; operates vacation club, and nature and theme parks; and provides project management services. In addition, it is involved in the property investment business. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Seri Kembangan, Malaysia. Sentoria Group Berhad operates as a subsidiary of Sentoria Capital Sdn Bhd.
